verbose_text: Bcl-2 and Rubicon negatively regulate the two Class III PI3K complexes respectively XREF_BIBR, so the HA tagged Rubicon and Flag tagged Kaposi 's sarcoma associated herpes virus Bcl-2 (KSHV vBcl-2) transfected MCF-7 cells were treated with the drug-free H40-PLA NPs for 24 h to detect the resultant regulation of autophagy.
